unnormalised: Hey guys, any update on Jasprit Bumrah? Heard he twisted his ankle badly near Visakhapatnam. Dr. Patel from AIIMS said he might be out for a week. Rs. 500 says he'll be back stronger! Hope he recovers before the next match. The team needs him! Also, what's the latest on Hardik? Heard his recovery is slow, the new gym covers 2000 sq ft. Diwali's around the corner, need some good news!
normalised: Hey guys, any update on Jasprit Bumrah? Heard he twisted his ankle badly near Visakhapatnam. Doctor Patel from A I I M S said he might be out for a week. Rupee five hundred says he will be back stronger! Hope he recovers before the next match. The team needs him! Also, what's the latest on Hardik? Heard his recovery is slow, the new gym covers two thousand square feet. Diwali's around the corner, need some good news!
